page.title: 14Languages in East Leicester.
page.content: My name is Vilash Patel & I live near Spinney Hill Park. In this area many people speak different languages. Muslims speak Urdu,Hindus speak Gujerati,Sikhs speak Punjabi & British people speak English. We can find out about other people's languages at libraries,community centres,mosques etc. Muslim children are taught how to read & write Urdu at their mosques. At my school & local library I can find books written in different languages. Community centres & voluntary groups help people to read,write & speak English by holding English classes. Nearly all the children in my class speak English as a second language. At home my friends & I like to speak English rather than our mother tongue, Gujerati.I don't know how to read & write Gujerati,but there are places where I can go to learn.
